name: codepilot
description: Code Pilot is an intelligent debugging assistant that transforms the debugging experience through natural language interaction. It acts as a chat-based debugger that reads your terminal output, analyzes your code, and provides explanations and solutions in real-time. With its VS Code extension integration, you can debug your applications without leaving your development environment.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
